about.me:
I started learning how to code in 2022 without any experience.
My coding skills were developed at Hive Helsinki, where I learned problem solving techniques, optimized code and embraced software design principles.

As someone aspiring to become a Full Stack Developer I recently finished the Full Stack Open Course offered by the University of Helsinki.

When it comes to frontend technologies, like HTML, CSS, JavaScript and React.js I have a grasp on them. Additionally I am proficient in technologies such, as Node.js, Express, MongoDB, REST API, GraphQL, Sanity CMS system, JSON and Redux Toolkit/Query.

footer.thankful: Thank you for getting in touch!
